title: What ever happened to the truesight buff?
body: You know, the one at the ends of the river that was meant to give a buff that increased your vision and if you stood still, gave vision over walls?

replies.body:
they changed it. that was only on PBE and it was deemed OP to have vision over walls for no real reason.

Pretty sure its what the old Raptor buff was and they changed them.

Just like there were going to be "health relics" that spawned in river and how Krugs used to grant your attacks true damage. it was all just testing.
